channel.title: Batch
channel.description: i have a program where it writes an input message to a text file, but how do I make it do it in a certain folder? so instead of [code]echo %Message% >%Name%.txt[/code] it's more like [code]echo %Message% >Folder/%Name%.txt[/code] Any ideas?

item.title: Batch
